name: sudo_creator
short_description:
This is a gui editor for creating/editing sudo files and rules.

You can open and modify and existing sudo file, or to save the rules you just created.

The programm is writen in gambas 3 and you will need the gambas3-runtime in order to run it.

For Debian/Ubuntu/Mint user you can install it from the repository.

For Slackware users you have to download gambas3 from 
http://pkgs.org/slackware-14.0/slacky-i486/gambas3-runtime-3.3.4-i486-1sl.txz.html
or
http://pkgs.org/slackware-14.0/slacky-x86_64/gambas3-runtime-3.3.4-x86_64-1sl.txz.html
